formalpara.title: Figure 13. Ascarosides identified in wild-type, acox-1, maoc-1, dhs-28, and daf-22 worms via LC-MS/MS. (a) (ω-1)-oxygenated ascarosides, (b) (ω)-oxygenated ascarosides, and (c) examples for 4'-acylated derivatives. Reprinted with permission from (von Reuss et al., 2012).
